title: Sniper.Elite.3.FINAL1-KaOs
description:
Release-Title:------------[ Sniper.Elite.3.FINAL-KaOs ]-
                                                        
Language:-----------------[ English ]-                  
                                                        
Archive/Count/Volume:-----[ RAR 67x50MEG = 3.09GIG ]-   
                                                        
Release/Date:-------------[ 04-10-2014 ]-               
                                                        
Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-                 
                                                        
Iso/Crack:----------------[ Reloaded ]-                 
                                                        
Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Nothing ]-                  
                                                        
Movie/Recode:-------------[ None ]-                     
                                                        
Audio/Recode:-------------[ Rebuild ]-                  
                                                        
Texture/Recode:-----------[ Rebuild ]-                  
                                                        
Rebuild/Temp/Space:-------[ Estimated 35GIG Free ]-     
                                                        
Final/Used/Space:---------[ 14.03GIG ]-                 
                                                        
Drivers/Extras:-----------[ DX, VcRedist ]-             

---------

Step-1:-------[ UnRAR Yourself Or Use Our Install.exe ]-      
                                                              
Step-2:-------[ Run ~Unpack~.bat As Administrator             
                To Unpack/Rebuild ]-                          
              ( Our Install.exe Does This Step For You )      
                                                              
Step-3:-------[ Click BinSniperElite3.exe To Play            
                Or Use The Created Desktop Shortcut ]-        
                                                              
WARNING*                                                      
                                                              
Time: The Install Was About 1Hour 45mins On A Standard HDD    
      (SSD Will Be Alot Faster)                               
                                                              
Our Texture Tool Requires vcredist_x86_2008 To Be Installed   
Otherwise The Alpha Masks Will Not Be Applied To Textures.    
Our Setup Will Attempt To Install It Wile Unpacking.          
                                                              
                                                              
DLCs which are included                                       
                                                              
 - Target Hitler: Hunt the Grey Wolf                          
 - Camouflage Weapons Pack                                    
 - Hunter Weapons Pack                                        
 - Patriot Weapons Pack                                       
 - Sniper Rifles Pack                                         
 - Axis Weapons Pack                                          
 - Eastern Front Weapon Pack                                  
 - Allied Reinforcement Outfits Pack                          
 - Season Pass                                                
 - Save Churchhill Part 1: In Shadows                         
 - Save Churchhill Part 2: Belly of the Beast                 
 - Save Churchhill Part 3: Confrontation                      
                                                              
 Update V1.10                                                 
                                                              
                                                              
FINAL Notes:                                                  
                                                              
Our Previous Versions Included Some Anoying Texture Glitches. 
We Have Redone The Game From Scratch And Included All Updates 
And DLCS. And Also Made This Version Smaller, Our Apologies   
For Our Failed Attempts And Enjoy The Game Smaller And Fuller.
                                                              
Guess You Could Say This Is Version Final .1                  
We Corrected The Audio Decoding Issue For Users Using Win8    
And Made The Redistributable Package Install Before Attempting
To Restore The Textures As Its Required For The Alpha Mask.   

---------

**FALSE-POSITIVES**                                           
                                                              
In Some Cases Some Of Our Tools May Get Detected As Suspicious
Or As A Virus By Some Antivirus Software. This Is Also The    
Case With Some Cracks/NoDVDs. We Assure You This Is A False   
Possitive And All Our Files Are Clean. If Any Of These Files  
Are Deleted The Chances Are The Game Will Not Start Or Will   
Function Incorrectly
